page.title: 10Home Life - (2)
page.content:
{Home Life}- A Day in the Life of a Pytchley{Schoolboy}- Continued. ______________________________________ 08.15 I walked to the bus stop and caught the bus. We got off in Pytchley Road, Kettering and walked the rest of the way to Bishop Stopford C.E. School.
08.40 I sorted out my homework which must be handed in.
08.50 I went to Assembly and then to registration.
09.20 My first{lesson}was{Games.} I played Rugby. It was very cold.
10.30 At break I met my friends and we stood around talking.
